title: 1 Bed 1 Bath | W/D | Condo Finishes | New Building | Hudson Yards
posting_body: ['*Virtual tour available upon request.', '*Schedule to see in person today!', '(William, 323.219.4160)', 'This 1 Bed 1 Bath home in Hudson Yards newest building features condo-level finishes throughout.', 'The gourmet kitchen is equipped with stainless steel Bertazzoni appliances, an in-cabinet microwave, a wood-paneled Blomberg dishwasher, custom cabinetry with lighting, and Quartz Countertops and backsplash.', 'Inside the spa-like bathroom you’ll find Italian porcelain tile, Grohe fixtures, an overhead and handheld shower, floating shelving, illuminated vanity mirror, and a spacious medicine cabinet.', 'Some of the other standout features that you’ll find inside are the oversized windows with custom shades, central AC and heat, an in-unit washer and dryer, USB outlets, and oak wood flooring.', 'THE BUILDING:', 'Community Recreation Facilities', 'Bike Storage', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Fitness Room', 'Garage', 'Locker', 'Live-in Super', 'Media Room', 'Package Room', 'Pets Allowed', 'Resident Lounge', 'Roof Deck', 'Storage Available', 'THE LOCATION:', 'Close to the City University of New York, Brooklyn Fare, The Edge, The Vessel, Javitz Center, Times Square, Port Authority, Penn Station, Restaurant Row, Equinox, Hudson Yards, The High Line, Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum, Target, Pier 76, Whole Foods, and easily accessible via the 1, 2, 3, 7, A, C, E, N, Q, R, W, S lines.', '*NER is based on the gross rent of $5,795 with one month free.', '*Photos represent the finishes.', '*Call, text, or reply for more information or to schedule a showing.', '(For a faster response please call or text.)', 'William Noorlag | Nest Seekers International', '323.219.4160']
